title: Coping with Depression
description: Learn some ways to cope with depression
author: Melinda Smith, M.A., Lawrence Robinson, and Jeanne Segal, Ph.D.
content:
These coping strategies can help you deal with depression and put you on the road to recovery:
1. Reach out and stay connected
2. Do things that make you feel good
3. Get moving and exercise
4. Get a daily dose of sunlight
5. Challenge negative thinking
6. Support your health by eating and sleeping well
